articles.author: Catie Edmondson
articles.title: Senate Passes $280 Billion Industrial Policy Bill to Counter China
articles.description: The bipartisan vote reflected a rare consensus in the otherwise polarized Congress in favor of investing federal resources into a broad industrial policy to counter China.

articles.title: Manchin and Schumer announce deal for energy and health care bill
articles.description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer and Sen. Joe Manchin on Wednesday announced a deal on an energy and health care bill, representing a breakthrough after more than a year of negotiations that have collapsed time and again.

articles.title: Family sues SeaWorld's Sesame Place Philadelphia for alleged racist interaction
articles.description: A Black family, who says Sesame Place Philadelphia character performers racially discriminated against them, filed a class action civil rights lawsuit against the amusement park's parent SeaWorld Parks & Entertainment in Pennsylvania federal court Wednesday.

articles.title: As Mega Millions hits $1 billion, winning doesn’t mean a happy ending

articles.title: Fed unleashes another big rate hike in bid to curb inflation
articles.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday raised its benchmark interest rate by a hefty three-quarters of a point for a second straight time in its most aggressive drive in more than three decades to tame high inflation.
